Name: Slime Escape
About the game: Slime Escape is an intense game: MrSlime needs to escape the mystery dungeon as soon as possible! Help him flee the dungeon by completing all 30 levels. Key Features Really Tough Challenges - 30 unique, handcrafted levels! Tight and Juicy - Controls are fine tuned so that it's fun and satisfying to move around! Steam Achivements
